data.actual_result: .gif Tenor Gifs do not embed at all; /raw Tenor Gifs embed only one frame into chat
data.expected_result: The GIF embeds both times and hovering mouse over GIF plays it
data.short_description: Tenor GIFS embed in broken ways
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the /tenor command in discord and paste it - The GIF will fail to embed when you send the message - Click on the link, copy the link address of the GIF itself (ending in /raw) and paste it in chat - The GIF will embed only one frame and the GIF wont play
